Description

Gearium is a game created as part of UCI GDIM 61 Final Project,  Spring 2022

Gear Spinner is a 2.5D adventure platformer that encourages puzzle solving and timing. Use the character’s abilities to run, wall jump, and grapple to different platforms!

Controls (Controller Required)

Xbox Controller:

A - Jump

Left Stick - Walk (Left or Right)

Right Trigger(RT) + Left Stick - Run (Left or Right)

Right Stick - Aim Grappler

Right Bumper (RB) - Grapple

Switch/Nintendo Contoller:

B - Jump

Left Stick - Walk (Left or Right)

ZR + Left Stick - Run (Left or Right)

Right Stick - Aim Grappler

Right Bumper (R) - Grapple

Mechanics

- jump to cancel grapple and build momentum to get further across platforms

- the grappling aim cursor will lock on where the player with grapple towards

- jump while on the side of a wall to wall jump (with jump button)
